errors.message: Type mismatch in declaration or constraint
errors.cause: Expression mixes incompatible types (int vs float, var vs par)

solutions.code: array[int] of var int: x; % avoid mixing par int with var float
solutions.when: Array elements or indices use different types

solutions.approach: Cast explicitly when mixing numeric kinds
solutions.when: Need float arithmetic with int variables
Forgot var keyword on optimized variable

errors.message: Name used before it was declared
errors.cause: Variable, set, or predicate referenced without a definition or include

solutions.code: int: n; array[1..n] of int: weights;

solutions.when: Using global constraint without importing library

errors.pattern: could not find solver|No solver specified
errors.message: MiniZinc cannot select or launch a solver
errors.cause: Solver not installed, not configured, or not passed with --solver

solutions.when: MiniZinc cannot find global solver registry

errors.cause: Constraints conflict or data is inconsistent

solutions.code: % comment out or soften balance constraints to locate conflict

solutions.approach: Ask solver for unsat core (if supported)
solutions.when: Need to identify minimal conflicting set

solutions.approach: Switch to satisfy to test feasibility
Change objective sense or add penalties
solutions.when: Maximization drives objective upward without restriction

errors.cause: Output section omitted relevant variables or uses wrong names

solutions.code: % use x not xs if variable is named x

errors.cause: Multiple declarations for the same variable, set, or predicate

solutions.code: var int: capacity; % remove duplicate declaration elsewhere

solutions.when: Two predicates share the same name
